alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:13AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL MONTOUR...EASTERN LYCOMING...NORTHWESTERN COLUMBIA AND SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM EDT... At 513 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles south of Canton to 12 miles north of Danville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hughesville, Jamison City, Waller, Kettle Creek Gorge, Lairdsville, Ricketts Glen State Park, Central, Exchange, Biggertown, Muncy Valley, Lincoln Falls, Barbours, Shunk, Picture Rocks, Dushore, Laporte, Forksville, Eagles Mere and Hillsgrove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Montour; Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan
